definition[0]: an exciting and unusual experience or situation that you imagine happening to you, but which will probably never happen
example[0]: I used to have fantasies about living in Paris with an artist.
example[2]: Young children sometimes canâ€™t distinguish between fantasy and reality.
example[3]: He lived in a fantasy world of his own, even as a small boy.
definition[1]: an idea or belief that is based only on imagination, not on real facts
example[4]: Memories can sometimes be pure fantasy, rather than actual recollections.
definition[2]: a story, film etc that is based on imagination and not facts
example[5]: a surrealist fantasy set in a South American village
